SystemErrorWithDumpFileDetected.Description: This message indicates a node-fatal error was detected on a given processing element and all available diagnostic data was encapsulated as CPER-formatted base64-encoded text in the 'DiagnosticData' field that is attached to the Event or LogEntry.
SystemErrorWithDumpFileDetected.Message: A fatal error was detected and a crashdump (CPER) file was created. For more details please see associated 'DiagnosticData'.
SystemErrorWithDumpFileDetected.Resolution: Decode, then analyze the provided crashdump file to determine a root cause

VRMMismatchFailure.Description: An error occured when trying to identify the config files to the vrm.
VRMMismatchFailure.Resolution: Please contact HPE support for further assistance.

Name: HPE Node Update Message Registry
